verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. Hear <WH8085> my prayer <WH8605>, O LORD <WH3068>, give ear <WH238> to my supplications <WH8469>: in thy faithfulness <WH530> answer <WH6030> me, and in thy righteousness <WH6666>.
And enter <WH935> not into judgment <WH4941> with thy servant <WH5650>: for in thy sight <WH6440> shall no man living <WH2416> be justified <WH6663>.

For the enemy <WH341> hath persecuted <WH7291> my soul <WH5315>; he hath smitten <WH1792> my life <WH2416> down <WH1792> to the ground <WH776>; he hath made me to dwell <WH3427> in darkness <WH4285>, as those that have been long <WH5769> dead <WH4191>.
Therefore is my spirit <WH7307> overwhelmed <WH5848> within me; my heart <WH3820> within <WH8432> me is desolate <WH8074>.
I remember <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of old <WH6924>; I meditate <WH1897> on all thy works <WH6467>; I muse <WH7878> on the work <WH4639> of thy hands <WH3027>.
I stretch forth <WH6566> my hands <WH3027> unto thee: my soul <WH5315> thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty <WH5889> land <WH776>. Selah <WH5542>.

Hear <WH6030> me speedily <WH4118>, O LORD <WH3068>: my spirit <WH7307> faileth <WH3615>: hide <WH5641> not thy face <WH6440> from me, lest I be like <WH4911> unto them that go down <WH3381> into the pit <WH953>.

Cause me to hear <WH8085> thy lovingkindness <WH2617> in the morning <WH1242>; for in thee do I trust <WH982>: cause me to know <WH3045> the way <WH1870> wherein <WH2098> I should walk <WH3212>; for I lift up <WH5375> my soul <WH5315> unto thee.
Deliver <WH5337> me, O LORD <WH3068>, from mine enemies <WH341>: I flee unto thee to hide <WH3680> me.
Teach <WH3925> me to do <WH6213> thy will <WH7522>; for thou art my God <WH430>: thy spirit <WH7307> is good <WH2896>; lead <WH5148> me into the land <WH776> of uprightness <WH4334>.
Quicken <WH2421> me, O LORD <WH3068>, for thy name's <WH8034> sake: for thy righteousness' <WH6666> sake bring <WH3318> my soul <WH5315> out of trouble <WH6869>.
And of thy mercy <WH2617> cut off <WH6789> mine enemies <WH341>, and destroy <WH6> all them that afflict <WH6887> my soul <WH5315>: for I am thy servant <WH5650>.
